source.name: Scholarships bring rising number of Saudis to U.S.
source.description: Saudi Arabia created the King Abdullah Scholarship program in 2006 in response to a post-9/11 dip in Saudis traveling to the U.S. Since its creation, the state-funded program has sent more and more Saudi students abroad every year.
